name: Arboretum (skibamykyta)
description:
Arboretum is a simulation game about growing an arboretum on an island.
It is not as simple as just growing trees, as they compete for resources, such as sunlight and water. Your goal is to create an successful arboretum with many different varieties of trees growing.

---------------------------------------------------

This project was created for a class at University of Washington, Bothell.

Because of limited class time, this is more of a prototype rather than a finished game.

---------------------------------------------------
